short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace instances of alt-right, white nationalist, or neo nazi with the far less dressed up and more accurate 'nazi'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Very simple text replacement script that replaces instances of "alt-right" "White Nationalist" "Neo-nazi" "White supremacist" and "kkk" with the much more clear term of "Nazi."

Watch how the tone of your news changes right in front of your eyes as you increase the accuracy of their wording.


Obviously, using this extension will have no impact on how the news is actually reported. This is intended to be used for personal entertainment.

I intend to do little or no maintenance of this code, but will address bugs as time permits.
